#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const ll mod=1e9+7;
ll dp[120][220][120][5];
ll solve(int reg,int free1,int sum,int dot)
{
    if(reg<0 || dot==3|| free1<0)
        return 0;
    if(reg==0)
    {
        if(sum>=100)
            return 1;
        else
            return 0;
    }
    if(sum>=100)
        return 1;
    if(dp[sum][reg][free1][dot]!=-1)
        return dp[sum][reg][free1][dot];
    ll ans=0;
    ans+=solve(reg-1,free1,sum+6,0);
    ans+=solve(reg-1,free1,sum+4,0);
    ans+=solve(reg-1,free1,sum+2,0);
    ans+=solve(reg-1,free1,sum+1,0);
    ans+=solve(reg-1,free1,sum,dot+1);
    ans%=mod;
    ans+=solve(reg,free1-1,sum+6,dot);
    ans+=solve(reg,free1-1,sum+4,dot);
    ans+=solve(reg,free1-1,sum+2,dot);
    ans+=solve(reg,free1-1,sum+1,dot);
    ans+=solve(reg,free1-1,sum,dot);
    ans%=mod;
    return (dp[sum][reg][free1][dot]=ans);
}
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    //freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    int t;cin>>t;
     memset(dp,-1,sizeof dp);
    while(t--)
    {

        int b,n;cin>>b>>n;
        cout<<(solve(b,n,0,0)+mod)%mod<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
